solution_line_template: If there were four rows of twenty gold bars arranged in the safe, the total number of bars in the safe is {num_rows}*{bars_per_row} = <<{num_rows}*{bars_per_row}={total_bars}>>{total_bars} bars.
Since each gold bar is worth ${worth_per_bar}, the {total_bars} bars are worth {total_bars}*${worth_per_bar} = $<<{total_bars}*{worth_per_bar}={total_worth}>>{total_worth}
